name: Gravity
description: What is the project about? A multi-asset lending protocol that utilizes both NFTs and Crypto as collateral. What makes your project unique? By utilizing both NFTs and Crypto as collateral, Whitehole Finance has high liquidity and can lend more assets to all users, creating a positive feedback loop that keeps capital flowing in. History of your project. Whitehole Finance began public marketing in March 2023, raised $600,000 in an IDO the following April, surpassed 1,000 active wallets, and gained over 60,000 Twitter followers. Whatâ€™s next for your project? Whitehole Finance will be partnering with more projects in the future, building projects that benefit Whitehole or helping them directly. What can your token be used for? GRV tokens can be used to boost GRV emissions through lockups, or can be used to increase the Ecoscore, a unique feature of the protocol and receive a weekly share of the protocol fees.
